title: Mysterious gift
body:
Hello dear players,
At a time when all received Riot Kayle I'd already had it. But I got only an icon and no mysterious gift... 
Does anyone know why???

FlamingFury3

replies.body: If you already had Riot Kayle, then you should have received an icon and a mystery gift.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at what happened, and get things fixed up.  We'll reply as soon as possible!
Summoner Icons are immediately unlocked. You are now in possession of the Omega Squad Teemo SUMMONER ICON, not the skin
